Targeted emails or messages to employees.Data: Zeek http.log, Zeek file.log, Windows Event ID 4663
Targeted emails or messages to employees.Action: Monitor Zeek http.log for connections initiated by internal users clicking links in suspected targeted emails containing keywords related to business partners. Monitor Zeek file.log and Windows Event ID 4663 on endpoints/servers for files associated with suspected targeted emails. Use keyword analysis on relevant logs. Use entropy analysis on file content to identify potentially malicious payloads.

Unusual or anomalous network traffic pat.Action: Identify network traffic (Zeek conn.log) originating from known IP ranges or domains of business partners using Zeek dns.log lookups. Analyze traffic volume, ports, protocols, and destination internal assets. Use descriptive statistics and time series analysis to establish baseline traffic patterns from these partners and identify deviations (sudden spikes, connections to unusual ports/services). Use correlation analysis between connection attempts and internal asset types.
